description technical detail:
Viewsonic 24" (23.6 Vis) LED backlight widescreen monitor
The ViewSonic VA2445m-LED is a 24" (23.6 Vis) widescreen monitor with an LED backlight and glossy, thin-bezel design ideal for use in the home or at the office. With Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution and a 10,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio, the VA2445m-LED delivers stunning brightness and contrast, while a quick 5 ms response time ensures crisp pictures and smooth playback. VGA and DVI inputs provide flexible and convenient connectivity. This beautiful display has a 10,000,000:1 MEGA dynamic contrast ratio, DVI inputs, 5 ms response time, and a VESA mountable glossy finish design. With energy-saving eco-mode, the VA2445m-LED is a great long-term investment.
